title: internal compiler error: gen_as_init couldn't make data statement
body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue. Thanks!

##### What version of Go are you using (`go version`)?

- go version go1.7rc1 darwin/amd64
- (also go version go1.6.2 darwin/amd64)

##### What operating system and processor architecture are you using (`go env`)?

```

GOBIN=""

GOGCCFLAGS="-fPIC -m64 -pthread -fno-caret-diagnostics -Qunused-arguments -fmessage-length=0 -fdebug-prefix-map=/var/folders/8z/b6ynlpkd5kxfb7f8zb4pxj7w0000gn/T/go-build587944134=/tmp/go-build -gno-record-gcc-switches -fno-common"
CXX="clang++"
CGO_ENABLED="1"
```

##### What did you do?

https://play.golang.org/p/jC6aV8VMMm
(reproduced below)

```
go build x.go
```

```
package main

import "unsafe"

func main() {
	_ = map[unsafe.Pointer]int{unsafe.Pointer(uintptr(0)): 0}
}
```

##### What did you expect to see?

No output (successful compile).
